file_content.text: And the backup squads? The long-range artillery installations? Did you find any trace of them?
The camps are empty, sir. Trail of bodies leading back to the mounds. The front lines are a graveyard.
Or the remnants of a feeding frenzy. These Killik hives are wiping us out. They're mindless insects.
Not so mindless, sir. They used tactics to lure the men out, surround them. Wipe them out.
We'll get a message to the field battalion. Our offensive waits until we deal with these things.
